original: intros p0 p1 a t H. unfold reconnaissance. unfold u_merge. simpl. destruct H as [d a t ladj HMap Hrec]. split. - unfold uad_conv_0. rewrite Nat2N.id. apply u_conv0. auto. - unfold uad_conv_0 in HMap. rewrite Nat2N.id in HMap. apply u_merge_0r with (s:=ladj) in HMap. + apply u_conv0_r in Hrec. apply HMap. + reflexivity.
